articles.content: Trap Queen rapper Fetty Wap has pleaded guilty to running an illicit drug operation in both New York and his native New Jersey, after cops fittingly busted the hip-hop artist with bricks of cocaine a… [+6021 chars]

articles.title: Harry Potter and Grease for £15 as theatres cut ticket prices - Evening Standard
articles.description: London Theatre Week will offer cut-price tickets to almost 60 critically-acclaimed shows
articles.content:
The Lion King, Frozen, Pretty Woman and The Book Of Mormon are among the West End shows taking part in a two-week campaign offering tickets for as little as £15, it was anounced on Monday.
